edu.balboa.apcs.MineSweeper

Class MineField

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.balboa.apcs.MineSweeper.MineField

  • public class MineField
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the grid and methods used to change the grid.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int difficulty(char a)
      Sets the selected difficulty with the correct board size.

      Translates the parameter value into a value for the column for the 2D Array.

      Returns the number of the mines around a given point.

      Translates the parameter value into a value for the row value in the 2D Array.
      int getSize()
      Access method for size variable
      void inspect(java.lang.String i)
      Inspects a square, if it hits a mine then it increase lose score by one if there are mines around it then it calls upon a method to set a number on the location, if it has no mines around it the it inspects the squares around it until it hits a number.

      Translate the 2D Array location into the user's view of the grid.

      • locaToStr

        public java.lang.String locaToStr(int i,
                         int a)
        Translate the 2D Array location into the user's view of the grid.
        Parameters:
        i - row
        a - column
        Returns:
        String of the location on the grid.

      • inspect

        public void inspect(java.lang.String i)
        Inspects a square, if it hits a mine then it increase lose score by one if there are mines around it then it calls upon a method to set a number on the location, if it has no mines around it the it inspects the squares around it until it hits a number.
        Parameters:
        i - a string representation of the location on the mine field to be inspected.

      • flag

        public void flag(java.lang.String i)
        flags the square at the given location.
        Parameters:
        i - string representation of the location on the mine field to be flagged

      • unFlag

        Unflag the square at a given location if it is already flagged
        Parameters:
        i - a string representation of the location on the mine field to be un-flagged
